screen.name: MessageBox
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (1780, textsize[1] + 10) t = int(textsize[1] + 10) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(685, textsize[1] + 17)) self.instance.move(ePoint(0,1080 - (textsize[1] + 127))) else: if (114 >t): top = 966 self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(120, int((114-t)/2))) else: top = 1080 - (textsize[1] + 7) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint(0,top)) self["list"].hide()

screen.name: DeviceManager2Message
screen.applet:
from enigma import eSize, ePoint textsize = self["messagetext"].getSize() textsize = (1780, textsize[1] + 10) t = int(textsize[1] + 10)
if (114 >t): top = 966 self["messagetext"].instance.move(ePoint(120, int((114-t)/2))) else: top = 1080 - (textsize[1] + 7) self["messagetext"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self.instance.move(ePoint(0,top))
